column4: pozac: that's not good. I'm quite new to linux. i will create a partition and copy install cd on it. but how do I run the install process?
you have to burn the cd image onto a cd and boot that cd
sorry, no fdd, cdrom, network card
can you do a dd if=cd-image of=/dev/hda (or similar)?
I think the el torito image has the same layout as the mbr
